title: Shopaholic Ties the Knot
description: Becky Bloomwood accepts the marriage proposal that her rich boyfriend has cunningly tucked into her best friend's bridal bouquetâ€”which Becky conveniently catches. Transatlantic high jinks follow when the couple's mothers and a despotic wedding planner work at cross purposes arranging the nuptials.An unabridged production on 12 CDs (approx. 14.75 hrs).
author: Sophie Kinsella
